text: Franciszek Maksymilian Pieczka (18 January 1928 – 23 September 2022) was a Polish actor.Franciszek Pieczka at www.culture.pl ) He first made his debut in the theatre in Jelenia Góra. He won the award for Best Actor at the Polish Film Festival in 1976 for The Scar. Polish Film Festival in Gdynia 1976 at the Internet Movie Database He also starred in Konopielka (1982), Axiliad (1986), The Mother of Kings (1987), Memories of a River (1990), Syzyfowe prace (1998), Quo Vadis (2001) and Jasminum (2006). On 11 November 2017, he was awarded the highest Polish state decoration, the Order of the White Eagle. Pieczka died on 23 September 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Franciszek Pieczka at the Internet Polish Movie Database Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Franciszek Pieczka
